title: Andrew | Balance Esencial
description: Check out CapCut's various templates on Andrew | Balance Esencial, including punch glass window by Phul The Adventurer , Agenda Aberta Viral by Dri ensina ...
cleaned_text: a range of powerful features for users. One key features is the ability to accurately remove the background of portrait videos and replace it with an uploaded image or change the background color. Additionally, CapCut can upscale images by increasing color correction, restore old photos, and colorize black and white photos with AI. Another notable feature of CapCut is its AI portrait generator, which resize videos and change their aspect ratio, while adding color, images, or blur effects to the background to meet the needs of various text to natural-sounding speech with just one click, with 11 voices and 10 languages supported. Finally, CapCut provides templates, music, stickers, resources
